I expected the lacy part to be itchy, tight, and all around uncomfortable. Couldn't have been more wrong! It was soft and stretchy. I was almost 5 months pregnant with my 4th, so definitely showing. This gave me comfort and style. Color was a true burgandy, not like so many other reds, which was what the bride wanted, and the arm length gave me a little coverage and warmth for the fall day. Would definitely recommend! Only con, the zipper was a bit sticky, especially around the middle part where the fabric transitions, bit not enough to dissuade me. Love!

评论概述: Sold a gown someone else wore
评论详情: This gown is pretty and fits well, the problem is it was obviously worn before I bought it. It has no tags and the smell of perfume is so strong, it’s gagging. It was hung outside all day with no success in lessening the overwhelming smell of cheap perfume. I need this for a wedding that is in 2 days. So no time to have it dry cleaned or to order a new one. I will not return it and have them turn around and do this to another person. Shame on this company.

评论概述: Beautiful Dress For The Perfect Wedding!
Perfect for a prom dress but not for the grandmother of the groom.
评论详情: This dress looked perfect for the recent wedding of my grandson, but I was very disappointed. The picture indicates the dress falls from the bodice very nicely. This was not the case when I tried it on. It poofs out-a lot-from the waist down. It was a pretty dress but not really appropriate for a more classic look for a slightly formal wedding. The color was also a little off. It appeared to be more of a rose but was actually a pretty, adolescent pink. Size wise, it does run small. It appeared to be well made and for someone for some type of occasion it might work. It just was not what I imagined it to be.
